name: Just A Cube (CST Games)
description:
Just A Cube is a 3D casual, endless block-dodger game with a simple UI, scoring mechanic and control system. The difficulty will gradually increase based on the score you got. The further you progressed, the more frequently the block waves will spawn, so it might be a challenge later on.

This is also my first project on the game making career, which is my dream since I was a middle school boy. I'm still learning about game engine and other related stuff so it might seem like a very basic game, but I'm happy with how it turned out and worth the time as well as the effort I spent on it.

The game comes with different downloadable files for different platforms (Windows, Linux, macOS), so choose the correct one for your system.

Finally, I'm hoping that you'll enjoy it and I'll be glad to hear your feedback and opinion for improvement.

FEATURES
  • An endless runway, the game only ends if you collide with the obstacles or fall off the edges.
  • 3 different camera angles to fit your style.
  • A high score system to display and store your best.
  • 6 difficulty levels, starts with the easiest one and gradually increases if you reach a specific score threshold.
  • A relaxing and chill music.
DOWNLOAD & INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

For Windows, download the setup file that compatible with your system, then run it and proceed through the installation.

For Linux and macOS, simply download the zipped file, extract its content and run the game directly.
